newsitem.title: ITALY: Bank of Italy sets 5.0 trillion lire repo tender.
newsitem.headline: Bank of Italy sets 5.0 trillion lire repo tender.

text.p: The Bank of Italy said it called a 5.0 trillion lire repurchase tender for today for government securities to be resold on July 15.
At the previous 29-day operation for 9.5 trillion lire on June 16, the minimum accepted rate stood at 6.82 percent and the average rate at 6.83 percent.
